Name: NetScaler ADC - Enable or Disable Service
Description: Enables or disables a load balancing service i Citrix NetScaler ADC. For documentation, see https://github.com/jnus/NetScalerPSLib

Parameters.Name: EnableOrDisable
Parameters.Label: Service status
Parameters.HelpText: Option whether to disable og enable a Load Balancing Service

Parameters.Name: ServiceName
Parameters.Label: LB Service Name
Parameters.HelpText: Load Balancing Service Name to enable or diable

Parameters.Name: HostName
Parameters.Label: NetScaler ADC host name
Parameters.HelpText: Address of the primary NetScaler ADC instance

Parameters.Name: Graceful
Parameters.Label: Graceful shutdown
Parameters.HelpText: The service is disabled only when all the current active client connections are closed by either the server or the client

Parameters.Name: GracefulDelay
Parameters.Label: Graceful Delay (s)
Parameters.HelpText: The time in seconds after which the service is marked as OUT OF SERVICE.
